function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lockdown of city and closure of public transport","Impact":"Isolation and limited access lead to economic hardships and potential mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide support for basic needs, mental health services, and financial assistance","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote services, contactless delivery, and telemedicine","People":"City residents, workers in affected industries","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Strict public management and restricted daily life","Impact":"Limited social interaction and movement may lead to social isolation and reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Promote virtual social activities, support community engagement, and provide mental health resources","Technologies":"Social media platforms, virtual event software, telehealth services","People":"Residents, particularly vulnerable populations","Owner":"Community organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Scattered outbreaks due to imported cases and goods","Impact":"Risk of resurgence and localized outbreaks leading to continued spread of the epidemic","Mitigation":"Strengthen border control measures, implement robust testing and tracing, and maintain public health vigilance","Technologies":"Border monitoring systems, rapid testing technologies, contact tracing apps","People":"Residents in affected areas, travelers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"}]}
